title: Permanent Suspension
body:
Thank you. I was just perma banned and I don't think I've felt this relieved in a very long time, this toxic environment brings something dark in me out, and I'm so glad its gone. I would say I'm almost excited, after pouring over almost $4,000 USD into this amazing game, the thing that I only realize after my 9th perma ban is that its the community that brings out the worst in this game. 

P.S. 
The passive aggressive players are the worst, I had an Annie who just flashed on me over and over and had her mastery 7 bound to her right click.
